Package com.group5.app

Class Handler

java.lang.Object
com.group5.app.Handler
public class Handler extends Object
Creates a LinkedList and stores all GameObject and runs through a loop to update all game objects.

render and tick method called only once to avoid duplicate input.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Marco Lai

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick()
      this tick method will loop through all game objects and updates. storing each object into temporary object.
